imdb.title: Regalia: The Three Sacred Stars
imdb.plot: When a large mecha attacks the Enastria Empire, sisters Yui and Rena are pulled from their peaceful life and into avortex of destiny!

episodes.title: Sisters
episodes.plot: Rena's date with Yui is interrupted by a mysterious person from her past.

episodes.title: Declaration
episodes.plot: As Empress,Yui is forced to choose who she will protect. More strangers appear seeking the Regalia.

episodes.title: Sincerity
episodes.plot: Alecto is confronted by a new potential threat. Yui visits the festival, while Rena prepares a surprise for Yui.

episodes.title: Feigned Confidence
episodes.plot: Yui and Rena's relationship is tested when they encounter a visitor from Rimgarde.

episodes.title: Counterattack
episodes.plot: Yui has devised a plan to deal with the threat from Abel, and along with Rena, they must find the strength to see it through.

episodes.title: Divine Machinations
episodes.plot: Yui, Rena, Tia, and Sara are summoned to another country by an unknown Regalia. Meanwhile, Johann grows restless.

episodes.title: The Past
episodes.plot: The girls find themselves wandering the ruins of Rimgarde, when they suddenly come across Kei.

episodes.title: Returning Home
episodes.plot: Johann forces a showdown while Tia and Rena leave their Regalia to search for Kei.

episodes.title: Succession
episodes.plot: Ingrid takes up temporary residence with Yui, giving them a chance to talk about the time Ingrid met Yui's mother.

episodes.title: Isolation
episodes.plot: Tia and Sara discover someone from their past amongst Johann's dolls. Later, Yui proposes a bold plan of action!

episodes.title: Prison
episodes.plot: Rena and Yui are reunited, while Sara, Tia, Kei, and Ingrid fight off Johann's Regalia Gear.

episodes.title: Reclamation
episodes.plot: Ingrid, Kei, Tia, and Sara continue to fight, managing to free Noa. Will Yui and Rena return in time?

episodes.title: Family
episodes.plot: Yui and all of her friends face off with Johann for a decisive battle.
